item.title: Political ecology of large mine permitting
item.description: Publications Tollefson, J. and Panikkar, B. (2020) “Impact assessment, public engagement, and environmental knowledge production: Large mine permitting in Alaska’s Yukon-Kuskokwim Delta”. Under review. Panikkar, B. and Tollefson, J. (2018) “Land as material, knowledge and relationships: Resource extraction and subsistence imaginaries in Bristol Bay, Alaska”. Social Studies of Science 48(5): 715-739. DOI: 10.1177/0306312718803453 Back to projects
